standard_metadata.standard_description: Use place value understanding to round decimals to any place.

hints.content: To help us round, let's place $56{,}291.8$ on a number line between the nearest thousands.    $5\blueE6{,}291.8$ has $\blueE6$ thousands so it would come in between $56{,}000$ and $57{,}000$.  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A number line from 56,000 to 57,000.

hints.content: The number $56{,}291.8$ has less than $5$ hundreds, so it is to the left of the midpoint.  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: The same number line with the midpoint labeled 56,500. The point 56,291.8 is between 56,000 and the midpoint.

hints.content: Since $56{,}291.8$ is closer to $56{,}000$, it would round to $56{,}000$.  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: The same number line with an arrow from 56,291.8 to 56,000.

hints.content: $56{,}291.8$ rounded to the nearest thousand is $56{,}000$.

To help us round, let's place $4{,}708.06$ on a number line between the nearest thousands.    $\blueE4{,}708.06$ has $\blueE4$ thousands so it would come in between $4{,}000$ and $5{,}000$.  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A number line from 4,000 to 5,000.

hints.content: The number $4{,}708.06$ has more than $5$ hundreds, so it is to the right of the midpoint.  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: The same number line with the midpoint labeled 4,500. The point 4708.06 is between 5,000 and the midpoint.

hints.content: Since $4{,}708.06$ is closer to $5{,}000$, it would round to $5{,}000$.  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: The same number line with an arrow from 4,708.06 to 5,000

hints.content: $4{,}708.06$ rounded to the nearest thousand is $5{,}000$.

To help us round, let's place $83{,}960.11$ on a number line between the nearest hundreds.    $83{,}\blueE960.11$ has $\blueE9$ hundreds so it would come in between $83{,}900$ and $84{,}000$.  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A number line from 83,900 to 84,000.

hints.content: The number $83{,}960.11$ has more than $5$ tens, so it is to the right of the midpoint.  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: The same number line with the midpoint labeled 83,950. The point 83,960.11 is between 84,000 and the midpoint.

hints.content: $83{,}960.11$ rounded to the nearest hundred is $84{,}000$.

To help us round, let's place $1{,}658.013$ on a number line between the nearest hundreds.    $1{,}\blueE658.013$ has $\blueE6$ hundreds so it would come in between $1{,}600$ and $1{,}700$.  [[☃ image 1]]
